prompt:
SCENE: A humorous visualization of nested code blocks.
- Multiple translucent boxes nested inside each other, like Russian dolls
- Each box glows with different neon color (blue then purple then pink then red)
- The innermost box has a small frustrated emoji-style face 
- Lines of connection going FROM outer boxes TO inner boxes (left to right)
- Dark background with subtle grid pattern

STYLE:
- Clean vector illustration
- Neon glow aesthetic
- Slightly humorous but not cartoonish

EXPLICIT DIRECTIONS:
- Nesting goes from OUTSIDE to INSIDE (representing deeper callbacks)
- Colors progress from cool (outer) to warm (inner) showing danger

CONSTRAINTS:
- No actual code text
- No human figures
- Family-friendly
- Original artwork only
